Description: Steatite shabti of Chief Lector Padiamunemipet with a lappet-wig, a collar and crossed hands in relief holding a hoe; the waist is inscribed with two rows(surviving) of Hieroglyphic text; most of the leg section is lost.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: George Annesley, 2nd Earl of Mountnorris
Condition: incomplete - leg section and left shoulder lost
